None.Name: Tainted Deconstruction
None.Description: Scorches the ground within a 20m radius which makes it impossible to build any hostile structures on it for the next 10 seconds. Buildings within that area will deal 50% less damage. The erection of buildings that  are presently under construction will be interrupted and it will not be possible to repair anything. Reusable every 30 seconds.
